_source.text: Restaurant Faam serves fine pizzas and some more Italian inspired dishes. They exceed in service! Smiles are standard here, and they are of the sort that show white teeth. 😀 The owner does a great job in finding friendly and hard working service staff. The pizza was a little neat and within the lines. We like it a bit more rustic :). But it was tasteful! ——————————————————————— Food ⭐️⭐️️⭐️ Service ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Ambiance ⭐️⭐️ ——————————————————————— #restaurant #pizza #faam #restaurantfaam.nl #reinierclaeszenstraat #janvangalen #bosenlommer #amsterdam  #amsterdamrestaurants #amsterdamfood #food #proefwerk #foodstagram

When you are on a diet (for just 3 days... 🙈) and all you can think is pizza. 🍕🍕🍕 This one with speck and fontina from @eatmosfera.amsterdam was heaven. #pizza #nationalpizzaday #italianrestaurant #amsterdamfood
Pizza verdura from Cafe Piazza near the Red Light District.

📸👉@lexflex81  Oh, yeah…they opened a Cannibale Royale in the Red Light District. Around the corner from Sichuan Kitchen (one of Sightseen’s favorites) and light-years from the @cannibaleroyale locations in Spui and De Pijp. The RLD version stands oddly on a street of terrible tourist pizza and waffles for stoned hostelists. But maybe when you can't get a table at the Spui location (and you're feeling particularly patient), it's worth firing up the bike bell and navigating the zombie hordes for some ribs in the RLD.  For all the best to eat, drink, see, and do in Amsterdam, download #sightseenapp for free from the App Store. Restaurant Faam serves fine pizzas and some more Italian inspired dishes. They exceed in service! Smiles are standard here, and they are of the sort that show white teeth. 😀 The owner does a great job in finding friendly and hard working service staff. The pizza was a little neat and within the lines. We like it a bit more rustic :). This one is bufala and like the ones that I ate in Napoli,not the same but close and it has crips layer at the bottom which is really important. Have you ever loved a city so much it made you cry ? Missed a city so much that you felt physically sick ? I don't know what it is but I remember that moment when I arrived in Amsterdam for the first time and it felt like coming home. Never had this feeling before or after. I believe in reincarnation and that most of us have lived many lives before. And I am sure I lived in Holland ♥️ this is my declaration of love you beautiful country, you beautiful city, you beautiful people, you beautiful architecture 🙌🏽 #Amsterdam #amsterdamcity #amsterdamfood #amsterdamweed #canals #water #people #watleuk #architecture #cityoflove #pizza #movingtoamsterdam #redlightdistrict #amsterdamarchitecture #dominospizza #architectuur #black #romantic #ikleernederlands #lifegoals #love #like4like

#shoarma #pizza met verse toppings 😀🍴 Eigenlijk gewoon een tortilla besmeerd met zure room, shoarma en wat jonge kaas erop en hup, in de oven. Daarna belegd met wat verse sjalot, gember, chilipeper en koriander 😊
When pizza and wine are life go to this Italian restaurant in De Pijp 🍷🍕@renatosamsterdam ❌❌❌

When I was away on my trip I always made it a habit to have food at cafes and not inside overwhelming fancy restaurants. Reason being that restaurants that serve all kinds of cuisines generally never have quality food 🙄 (unless you are dining at a really really costly one). Cafes on the other hand never disappoint and fit ones budget. Italian cafes serve awesome italian food, spanish cafes serve awesome spanish food and so on. 🤘  I fell in love with pizzas all over again 😄 Don't want to sound harsh but I really don't like the kind of pizzas chains like Dominos and Pizza Hut sell here.  Italian cafes on the other hand served awesome italian food all round let alone pizzas. I fell in love with Tuna fish toppings 😁 I miss the food I had all through the trip 😞  Nice memories! 😊  #streetsofamsterdam #amsterdam #amsterdamfood #italiancafe #pizzalovers #pizzaislovepizzaislife #europe #eurotrip2015
heel lekker #pizza #truffle #wine #basil #cheese #heellekker #amsterdamfood

Repost @mandygiltjes 'Lunch/Dinner 🍴 at #Mazzo' #rozengracht #amsterdam #amsterdamfood #amsterdamstreet #spaghetti  #crab #pizza #pizzadinner #crostini #avocadotoast #eggsbenedict #amsterdamcity

Amsterdam Special #4: Bacon Pancakes!  Pancakes in Amsterdam are flatter than their American cousins. They are as big as a 12 inch pizza and when topped with toppings like bacon, chicken, et al, the world just becomes much better to live in. Top this off with a generous helping of dutch maple syrup and you have a winning combo. And De Vier Pilaren does one of the best pancakes and poffertjes around! Highly recommended.  #bacon #pancakes #amsterdamfood Follow for more delicious food pics. I guess it is a week of #indulgence. Pizza @depizzabakkers. The taste combination on Spinaci with goat cheese, carmelized onion and pine nuts was not my favourite, but Tartufo i can definitely recommend! And Scroppino! #amsterdamfood #pizza #italianfood #increaselifequality #introverteats #instafoodie

Even in Italy I couldn't get this pizza off my mind. It's superb. Have the "Fuoco Vivo" (a white pizza with mozzarella, homemade sausage, porcini mushrooms and parmesan cheese), drizzle it with spicy oil and don't leave without trying the sgroppino (cocktail with lemon sorbet ice, vodka and prosecco) and homemade limoncello or crema di limoncello. #thankmelater #superb #pizza #fuocovivo #bestpizzainamsterdam #instafood #amsterdam #amsterdameats #amsterdamfood #amsterdamdinner
